cologre Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
CColladaDatabaseBase class to load collada files and convert resources and scenes to Ogre
CControllerConverterParses collada controller libraries
CConverterBase class for all converter classes
CGeometryConverterClass for converting collada geometry into ogre meshes
CMaterialConverterClass for converting collada materials into ogre materials
conversionOptionsGlobal struct with conversion options. make sure to set these before calling any convert functions
CResourceConverterAbstract base class for all resource converters
CSceneConverterClass for converting collada scenes into ogre scenegraphs
